ygData.subject: RE: So anyone wanna trade...
ygData.msgSnippet: That s cuz drums aren t that cheap.  They just aren t.  If drums sold for 500pp or less then every level ~22 bard would have set.  The RotO might be worth a
ygData.messageBody:
That's cuz drums aren't that cheap. They just aren't. If drums sold for
500pp or less then every level ~22 bard would have set. The RotO might be
worth a bit more than the drums, I don't know, but I've seen only ONE set of
drums on Fennin Ro in the last few weeks that would sell for cash and wasn't
TRADE ONLY for rediculous things like Ykeshas. They were 850pp - I paid
that for them and would do it again.

Crier Sharpsong - 32nd song bard on Fennin Ro


> ACK! Thanks for the info.....had no idea the drums were so cheap......hmm,
> maybe a drum/armor trade for the robes would be wiser.
>
> Thanks again
>
> Dank McGillicuty
>
> > Kyle Q wrote:
> >
> > > Would a Robe of the Oracle be a decent trade for a pair of MM Battle
> drums?
> > > Also anyone on Bristlebane interested in a trade like this? =)
> > >
> > > Dank McGillicuty
> >
> > I think the robe would be too mutch...
> >
> > The robe go for 1000-1500pp
> > The Drum go for 250-500pp
> >
> > Up to you to make the trade...
> >
> > --
> > Benoit St-Hilaire
> > bsthilai@...
